Literature.Title: Peptide Antibiotics Developed by Mimicking Natural Antimicrobial Peptides
Literature.Author: Unubol N, Cinaroglu SS, Elmas MA, Akçelik S, Ildeniz ATO, Arbak S, Allahverdiyev A, Kocagoz T

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=32µg/ml),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=16µg/ml)
